TI_DOC.P: EIB - Design and construction of water treatment plants (TZ-Mwanza)

STI_DOC.P: Prequalification No. AE/042/2015-2016/W/03c for Design and Build of Butimba Intake, Raw Water Pipeline and Water Treatment Plant (WTP)
Invitation for Prequalification

CONTENTS.P: 1) This invitation for prequalification follows the general procurement notice for this project that appeared in Official Journal of the European Union (OJEU) and Tanzania Daily Newspaper, both of 19 January 2018;

2) The Mwanza Urban Water Supply and Sanitation Authority (MWAUWASA) through the Government of The United Republic of Tanzania has received a loan from the European Investment Bank (EIB) and Agence Francaise de Development (AFD) towards the cost of the water aupply, wastewater and sanitation in Mwanza City, and it intends to apply part of the proceeds of this loan to payments under the contract No. AE/042/2015-2016/W/03c for the Design and Build of Butimba intake, Raw Water Pipeline and Water Treatment Plant (WTP) with an approximate capacity of 40,000m3/d;

3) MWAUWASA now invites sealed contractors or firms to apply for prequalification for Design and Build of Butimba intake, Raw Water Pipeline and Water Treatment Plant (WTP) with an approximate capacity of 40,000m3/d;
4) Mwanza Urban Water Supply and Sanitation Authority intends to prequalify contractors and/or firms with capacity and experience within works mentioned for the above contract.
The main applied selection criteria for the shortlist are:
(a) Experience for water treatment works constructed under a design and build arrangement;
(b) Experience for raw water intakes and pumping stations works.
The detailed selection criteria are described in the prequalification document;
5) Prequalification will be conducted through International Competitive Tendering (ICT) procedures specified under the European Investment Bank Guide to Procurement;
6) The construction Works for this Contract will be executed under the FIDIC Yellow Book — Conditions of Contract;

7) Interested applicants may obtain further information and inspect the prequalification document from the office of Secretary of Tender Board Wing No. 3B at the Mwanza Urban Water Supply and Sanitation Authority (address below) from 19 January 2018 on weekdays from 0800 to 1630 hours (local time);

8) A complete set of the prequalification document in English may be obtained electronically by interested applicants on the submission of a written email request to the following email addresses: procurement@mwauwasa.go.tz and info@mwauwasa.go.tz

9) All completed PQ Documents in One Original plus Four Copies properly filled in and enclosed in a sealed plain envelop clearly marked “Prequalification No. AE/042/2015-2016/W/03c for “Design and Build of Butimba Intake, Raw Water Pipeline and Water Treatment Plant (WTP)” must be delivered to the address below:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Mwanza Urban Water Supply and Sanitation Authority
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Maji House, Balewa Road, Wing No 3B (PMU Office), P.O. Box 317,

CONTENTS.P: So as to reach him not later than 20 February 2018 at 11:30 a.m.

Prequalification Document will be opened thereafter in public and in the presence of contractor’s representatives who may choose to attend in the opening ceremony at the MWAUWASA Head Office, Boardroom, Maji House situated at Isamilo Area, Balewa Road on 20 February 2018 at 11:30 a.m.;

10) Late Prequalification Documents, Portion of Prequalification Documents, Electronic Prequalification Documents, Prequalification Documents not received, Prequalification Documents not opened and not read out in public at the opening ceremony shall not be accepted for evaluation irrespective of the circumstances.
Managing Director
Mwanza Urban Water Supply and Sanitation Authority
